text: The second pattern we're going to take a look at is short covering, also known as the

When we get AP or short covering, it's due to an overextended sell-off and the market
has accepted very little value on the way down.
So the market's been failing to accept any kind of balance.

initiative move, this would occur toward the backend or the end of the initial phase.

So when we see both short covering patterns as well as long liquidation patterns, that
